reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 282/94: REDUCTION OF DISPENSING FEES
reg_info.act_under: Social Contract Act, 1993   Loi de 1993 sur le contrat social

content.content: 1. For the purpose of subsection 44 (4) of the Act, any dispensing fees payable on or after April 1, 1994 by the Minister of Health under subsections 3 (8) and (10) of Regulation 868 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (made under the Ontario Drug Benefit Act) shall be reduced by 17 cents and 36 cents respectively. O. Reg. 282/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purpose of subsection 44 (4) of the Act, any dispensing fees payable on or after April 1, 1994 by the Minister of Health under subsections 3 (8) and (10) of Regulation 868 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (made under the Ontario Drug Benefit Act) shall be reduced by 17 cents and 36 cents respectively. O. Reg. 282/94, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 282/94, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 282/94, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 282/94, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 282/94, s. 3.
